item.description:
7 pm – The meeting will start at 7pm with a guest speaker, Lynette Correa, founder/CEO of Career Coaching 4 Kids, Collegiate Career Coaching, and Chameleon Career Coaching. Lynette is an internationally-recognized Student-Career Coaching Expert and a Boston native. " The Impression Management: The Elevator Pitch" highly interactive mini-workshop will be facilitated by Lynette. She will advise on specific information to give during your elevator pitch, it's origins, and there will be an "Ask the Expert" at the end of the speedy workshop."Food will be catered by Jacob Wirth.

 

8 pm – General Meeting Come join us for our  regularly scheduled meeting. We allot roughly 45 minutes for each speaker (usually 30 minutes for presentation and 15 minutes Q&A) then we begin the meeting at 8pm and discuss all the exciting happenings of the club! Come for one event, or both! All are welcome, so please feel free to bring a friend! We will likely head out for a drink or two after the meeting, so plan to make a night of it! :D
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into 116 Beacon, down the hall & take the stairs on the left going down. Then the spiral stairs up to the Trustee's Reading Room (TRR)!

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Boston Rotaract Speaker and General Meeting
